not_data.label: Not Data
not_data.description: A visualization should illustrate actual data, not just concepts.

selective_data.label: Selective Data
selective_data.description: A visualization should not cherry-pick data to support a predetermined conclusion.

dubious_data.label: Dubious Data
dubious_data.description: A visualization should be based on reliable and valid sources.

non_sequitur.label: Non-Sequitur
non_sequitur.description: A visualization should reveal meaningful information from the data.

too_few_data_points.label: Too Few Data Points
too_few_data_points.description: A visualization should not connect just two data points with a line to imply a trend.

discretized_continuous_variable.label: Discretized Continuous Variable
discretized_continuous_variable.description: Visualizations should not unnecessarily turn continuous variables into categories.

missing_normalization.label: Missing Normalization
missing_normalization.description: A visualization should compare per capita values when appropriate, not just absolute values.

inappropriate_item_order.label: Inappropriate Item Order
inappropriate_item_order.description: A visualization should order items logically, not arbitrarily.

inappropriate_metric.label: Inappropriate Metric
inappropriate_metric.description: A visualization should use appropriate metrics, thresholds, or definitions for grouping data.

questionable_prediction.label: Questionable Prediction
questionable_prediction.description: A visualization should not extrapolate current trends without explaining the projection method.

trend_line_on_random_data.label: Trend Line on Random Data
trend_line_on_random_data.description: A visualization should not apply regression lines to data with weak correlation.

inappropriate_use_of_accumulation.label: Inappropriate Use of Accumulation
inappropriate_use_of_accumulation.description: A visualization should not accumulate historical values to hide recent declining values.

inappropriate_aggregation_granularity.label: Inappropriate Aggregation Granularity
inappropriate_aggregation_granularity.description: A visualization should use an appropriate level of data aggregation.

two_way_normalization.label: Two-Way Normalization
two_way_normalization.description: Visualizations should not arbitrarily divide values by column or row totals.

data_of_different_magnitudes.label: Data of Different Magnitudes
data_of_different_magnitudes.description: A visualization should not plot two series with vastly different magnitudes on the same scale.

dual_axis.label: Dual Axis
dual_axis.description: A visualization should use dual axes carefully, ensuring clear labeling and explanation to prevent misinterpretation.

extended_axis.label: Extended Axis
extended_axis.description: A visualization should not extend axes beyond what's appropriate for the data.

inappropriate_axis_range.label: Inappropriate Axis Range
inappropriate_axis_range.description: A visualization should use appropriate axis ranges that fit the data.

inverted_axis.label: Inverted Axis
inverted_axis.description: A visualization should not flip axes from convention without good reason.

linear_scale_on_exponential_data.label: Linear Scale on Exponential Data
linear_scale_on_exponential_data.description: A visualization should use appropriate scales for the data type.

log_scale.label: Log Scale
log_scale.description: A visualization should indicate when a logarithmic scale is used.

truncated_axis.label: Truncated Axis
truncated_axis.description: A visualization should show the full range of values on its axes.

confusing_chart_type.label: Confusing Chart Type
confusing_chart_type.description: A visualization should not use chart types that deviate slightly from standard conventions.

inappropriate_use_of_bar_chart.label: Inappropriate Use of Bar Chart
inappropriate_use_of_bar_chart.description: A visualization should use bar charts only when appropriate for the data type.

inappropriate_use_of_line_chart.label: Inappropriate Use of Line Chart
inappropriate_use_of_line_chart.description: A visualization should use line charts only for continuous data and with correct axis orientation.

inappropriate_use_of_pie_chart.label: Inappropriate Use of Pie Chart
inappropriate_use_of_pie_chart.description: A visualization should use pie charts only for part-to-whole relationships with a small number of categories, typically no more than 5-7 slices.

inappropriate_use_of_scatterplot.label: Inappropriate Use of Scatterplot
inappropriate_use_of_scatterplot.description: A visualization should use scatterplots only when showing relationships between two variables.

inappropriate_use_of_stacked_charts.label: Inappropriate Use of Stacked Charts
inappropriate_use_of_stacked_charts.description: A visualization should not stack too many layers in a chart.

misusing_circular_layout.label: Misusing Circular Layout
misusing_circular_layout.description: A visualization should not use circular layouts that make accurate comparisons difficult.

color_blind_unfriendly.label: Color Blind Unfriendly
color_blind_unfriendly.description: A visualization should use color schemes that are distinguishable by color-blind individuals.

indistinguishable_colors.label: Indistinguishable Colors
indistinguishable_colors.description: A visualization should use distinct colors for different categories.

overusing_colors.label: Overusing Colors
overusing_colors.description: A visualization should use colors judiciously and meaningfully.

cluttering.label: Cluttering
cluttering.description: A visualization should not include too many data points or series.

confusing_legend.label: Confusing Legend
confusing_legend.description: A visualization should have a clear, well-organized legend.

illegible_text.label: Illegible Text
illegible_text.description: Visualizations should not have overlapping or unreadable text.

misalignment.label: Misalignment
misalignment.description: A visualization should have appropriately aligned items and labels.

missing_abbreviation.label: Missing Abbreviation
missing_abbreviation.description: A visualization should use appropriate abbreviations for long text.

plotting_error.label: Plotting Error
plotting_error.description: A visualization should be free of numerical or software errors.

plotting_out_of_chart.label: Plotting Out of Chart
plotting_out_of_chart.description: Data values that go beyond the axis range should not be included in a visualization.

missing_axis.label: Missing Axis
missing_axis.description: A visualization should include all necessary axes.

missing_axis_ticks.label: Missing Axis Ticks
missing_axis_ticks.description: A visualization should have appropriate tick marks on its axes.

missing_axis_title.label: Missing Axis Title
missing_axis_title.description: A visualization should have clear titles for all axes.

missing_legend.label: Missing Legend
missing_legend.description: A visualization should include a legend when multiple data series are present.

missing_title.label: Missing Title
missing_title.description: A visualization should have a clear, descriptive title.

missing_units.label: Missing Units
missing_units.description: A visualization should indicate the units of measurement.

missing_value_labels.label: Missing Value Labels
missing_value_labels.description: A visualization should include value labels where appropriate.

changing_scale.label: Changing Scale
changing_scale.description: A visualization should maintain consistent scales within the same chart and between related charts.

inconsistent_binning_size.label: Inconsistent Binning Size
inconsistent_binning_size.description: A visualization should use consistently defined boundaries for binning groups.

inconsistent_grouping.label: Inconsistent Grouping
inconsistent_grouping.description: A visualization should apply consistent grouping methods across all data.

inconsistent_tick_intervals.label: Inconsistent Tick Intervals
inconsistent_tick_intervals.description: A visualization should use regular, logical intervals for tick marks.

inconsistent_tick_labels.label: Inconsistent Tick Labels
inconsistent_tick_labels.description: A visualization should use consistently formatted tick labels.

inconsistent_value_labels.label: Inconsistent Value Labels
inconsistent_value_labels.description: A visualization should use consistently formatted value labels.

misrepresentation.label: Misrepresentation
misrepresentation.description: A visualization should draw data proportionally and to scale.

violating_color_convention.label: Violating Color Convention
violating_color_convention.description: A visualization should use colors that match conventional meanings unless clearly explained otherwise.

three_d.label: 3d
three_d.description: A visualization should avoid unnecessary 3D for 2D data, reserving 3D for inherently three-dimensional data or complex spatial relationships.

area_encoding.label: Area Encoding
area_encoding.description: A visualization should use area encoding judiciously, ensuring it's appropriate for the data type and clearly explained.

distractive_value_labels.label: Distractive Value Labels
distractive_value_labels.description: A visualization should position value labels to avoid affecting perceived data size.

inappropriate_aspect_ratio.label: Inappropriate Aspect Ratio
inappropriate_aspect_ratio.description: A visualization should use an aspect ratio that accurately represents data relationships.

inappropriate_use_of_smoothing.label: Inappropriate Use of Smoothing
inappropriate_use_of_smoothing.description: A visualization should use data smoothing judiciously and explain transformations.

ineffective_color_scheme.label: Ineffective Color Scheme
ineffective_color_scheme.description: A visualization should use color schemes that enhance data understanding.

map_projection_distortion.label: Map Projection Distortion
map_projection_distortion.description: A map visualization should select appropriate projections for the specific geographic area and data type.

pictorial_area_encoding.label: Pictorial Area Encoding
pictorial_area_encoding.description: Visualizations should use pictograms or icon-based encoding thoughtfully, ensuring accurate data representation without introducing bias.

sine_illusion.label: Sine Illusion
sine_illusion.description: A visualization should be aware of perceptual effects on curve steepness in line charts.

correlation_not_causation.label: Correlation, Not Causation
correlation_not_causation.description: A visualization should not imply causation from correlation.

invalid_comparison.label: Invalid Comparison
invalid_comparison.description: A visualization should only compare related and comparable data points.

pattern_seeking.label: Pattern Seeking
pattern_seeking.description: A visualization should not use historical correlation to predict future trends without justification.

hidden_distribution.label: Hidden Distribution
hidden_distribution.description: A visualization should show underlying data distribution when relevant.

hidden_population_size.label: Hidden Population Size
hidden_population_size.description: A visualization should indicate the size of the population represented by the data.

hidden_uncertainty.label: Hidden Uncertainty
hidden_uncertainty.description: A visualization should include appropriate representations of data uncertainty.

overplotting.label: Overplotting
overplotting.description: A visualization should use techniques to prevent overlapping data points from obscuring patterns.

misleading_annotation.label: Misleading Annotation
misleading_annotation.description: A visualization should use accurate and unbiased annotations.

misleading_claim.label: Misleading Claim
misleading_claim.description: A visualization should not make claims unsupported by the data.

misleading_title.label: Misleading Title
misleading_title.description: A visualization should have an accurate title that reflects the true nature of the data.

misleading_value_labels.label: Misleading Value Labels
misleading_value_labels.description: A visualization should have value labels that accurately reflect the underlying data.
